sub_title: Manager Intensifying Climate Action at Provincie Gelderland
summary:
My personal goal is having a happy, meaningful and joyful life with family, friends and colleagues.

For several years my professional goal was providing conditions in which persons, industries and organisations can develop, especially by improving sustainable access through provision of traffic and transport possibilities in combination with spatial planning.  Although sustainable accessiblity remains important, I have recently shifted my focus on creating conditions for more climate action. As this challenge gives me energy and I think I can contribute to the reduction of greenhouse gases with my knowledge, network and experience.

My fields of experience are:
Administration (supporting boards and councils)
Networking, lobbying and facilitating
Climate Action
Biogas technology
Integrated spatial and transport planning
Transport and traffic engineering
Labour-based technology (construction and maintenance)
Environmental assessment studies
